title: News24.com | 'We're not going to die from the virus, but from hunger!'
description: "The people are not going to die from the virus - they are going to die from hunger!" This is the cry of a Cape Town mother who lives in a community close to where two food trucks were stoned.
content:
"The people are not going to die from the virus - they are going to die from hunger!" 
This cry by a Cape Town mother on Wednesday was heard by News24 barely 50m from where at least two food trucks were stoned and looted on Robert Sobukwe Road just off the N… [+2215 chars]
